1 // http://wiki.ros.org/roscpp/Overview/Timers
2 #include <iostream>
3 #include <fstream>
4 #include "ros/ros.h"
5 #include "nav_msgs/Odometry.h"
6 #include "ros/package.h"
7 
8 //synch callbacks https://answers.ros.org/question/280856/synchronizer-with-approximate-time-policy-in-a-class-c/
9 #include <message_filters/subscriber.h>
10 #include <message_filters/synchronizer.h>
11 #include <message_filters/sync_policies/approximate_time.h>
12 
13 #define TIMER 10 // how many sec needed for robot to stand still and then shutdown ros node
14 #define VEL_TRESHOLD 0.07 // velocity threshold for "standing still"
15 #define COUNT_TO_DEATH 4
16 
17 class StillnessChecker
18 {
19 private:
20  geometry_msgs::Twist last_velocity1, last_velocity2;
21  bool is_still1, is_still2;
22  double still_threshold;
23  double startTime;
24  ros::Timer timer;
25  int counter1, counter2;
26 
27  //https://answers.ros.org/question/280856/synchronizer-with-approximate-time-policy-in-a-class-c/
28  message_filters::Subscriber<nav_msgs::Odometry> sub1;
29  message_filters::Subscriber<nav_msgs::Odometry> sub2;
30  typedef message_filters::sync_policies::ApproximateTime<nav_msgs::Odometry, nav_msgs::Odometry> MySyncPolicy;
31  typedef message_filters::Synchronizer<MySyncPolicy> Sync;
32  boost::shared_ptr<Sync> sync;
33 
34 public:
40  StillnessChecker() : is_still1(false), is_still2(false)
41  {
42  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
43  sub1.subscribe(nh, "odom_sub1", 1);
44  sub2.subscribe(nh, "odom_sub2", 1);
45 
46  sync.reset(new Sync(MySyncPolicy(10), sub1, sub2));
47  sync->registerCallback(boost::bind(&StillnessChecker::odomCallback, this, _1, _2));
48 
49  startTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
50  timer = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(TIMER), &StillnessChecker::timerCallback, this);
51 
52  still_threshold = VEL_TRESHOLD; // velocity threshold for "standing still"
53  counter1 = 0;
54  counter2 = 0;
55  }
56 
62  void odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &odom_1_data, const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &odom_2_data)
63  {
64  geometry_msgs::Twist current_velocity_1 = odom_1_data->twist.twist;
65  geometry_msgs::Twist current_velocity_2 = odom_2_data->twist.twist;
66  //std::cout << "Current velocity 1: linear " << fabs(current_velocity_1.linear.x) << "\tangular vel: " << fabs(current_velocity_1.angular.z) << std::endl;
67  //std::cout << "Current velocity 2: linear " << fabs(current_velocity_2.linear.x) << "\tangular vel: " << fabs(current_velocity_2.angular.z) << std::endl;
68  if (fabs(current_velocity_1.linear.x) < still_threshold && fabs(current_velocity_1.angular.z) < still_threshold)
69  {
70  last_velocity1 = current_velocity_1;
71  is_still1 = true;
72  }
73  else
74  {
75  is_still1 = false;
76  }
77 
78  if (fabs(current_velocity_2.linear.x) < still_threshold && fabs(current_velocity_2.angular.z) < still_threshold)
79  {
80  last_velocity2 = current_velocity_2;
81  is_still2 = true;
82  }
83  else
84  {
85  is_still2 = false;
86  }
87  }
88 
94  void timerCallback(const ros::TimerEvent &event)
95  {
96  if(is_still1) counter1++;
97  else counter1 = 0;
98 
99  if(is_still2) counter2++;
100  else counter2 = 0;
101 
102  if (counter1 > COUNT_TO_DEATH || counter2 > COUNT_TO_DEATH)
103  {
104  std::cout << "\n\nRobot is standing still!" << std::endl;
105  std::cout << "Robot is standing still!" << std::endl;
106  std::cout << "Robot is standing still!\n\n" << std::endl;
107 
108  //writes the time into a file
109  std::string path = ros::package::getPath("gruppe5");
110  std::string filepath = path + "/Time_Table";
111  std::ofstream log(filepath.c_str(), std::ios_base::app | std::ios_base::out);
112  double elapsedTime = ros::Time::now().toSec() - startTime;
113  std::cout << "Time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
114  log << elapsedTime << "\t standing still" << "\n";
115 
116  ros::shutdown();
117  }
118  }
119 };
120 
126 int main(int argc, char **argv)
127 {
128  ros::init(argc, argv, "stillness_checker");
129 
130  StillnessChecker sc;
131 
132  ros::spin();
133  return 0;
134 }
